title: Value of Arsenal FC 's jersey sponsorship 2009 to 2020
yAxis: Jersey sponsorship revenue in million GBP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Jersey sponsorship revenue in million GBP, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2017/18_(Fly_Emirates) to 2013/14_(Fly_Emirates).
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2012/13_(Fly_Emirates) to 2009/10_(Fly_Emirates).
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2019/20_(Fly_Emirates) to 2018/19_(Fly_Emirates).
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2018/19_(Fly_Emirates) to 2017/18_(Fly_Emirates).
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013/14_(Fly_Emirates) to 2012/13_(Fly_Emirates).
gold: The statistic shows the revenue Arsenal FC generated from its jersey sponsorship deal from the 2009/10 season to the 2019/20 season . In the 2019/20 season , Arsenal FC received 40 million GBP from its jersey sponsor Fly Emirates .
